1.title: How to Find a Job or Career You Will Like
1.plot: Join RJ Tolson, best-selling author, co-founder of Pearit, and creator of SparkLift as he goes over the series to come.

2.title: CÓMO Encontrar un Trabajo o Carrera Que le Gustará
2.plot: International fitness trainer Gia Fey, with 400,000 subscribers and 35 million views to her name, hosts an intro session on internships in Spanish.

3.title: Internships for Chinese People in America
3.plot: Head of Business Development for Pearit (Sparklift, InternMagic, InternLogic), Harrison B. Chen, discussed the basics of internships in Chinese, for Chinese speakers.

4.title: How to Get an Internship: For Chinese Speakers
4.plot: Moving anywhere can be hard - but what about from China to America, and what are the steps to get an internship, let alone a job?

5.title: Why Internships? What's the point?
5.plot: Join Garrett Miller, previous fortune 500 VP of Sales, published writer, and singer as he answers how to get an intern or get an internship.

6.title: Top Job Secrets: Let's Uncover them!
6.plot: Co-founder Harrison B. Chen is joined by Taiwanese guest artistic talent, Po-Jui, to discuss how to secure that internship. Good, Bad, and in between practices.

imdb.plot outline: This show is a series focused on all things internship related. Ever wondered why internships really matter, how they work, or even just what they really are supposed to be? What about finding the best internship for you, getting that internship, and using it to build a career you actually enjoy? Intern Academy, a series in multiple languages, will cover all of this and more. Different episodes in this English series will be hosted by a variety of experts, industry professionals, and more. Sparklift is the sister to brand to InternMagic, an online platform, and app that connects students and people with employers based on personality and compatibility for free.
imdb.title: Intern Academy
plot: A series, in multiple languages, focused on all things internship related, from the creator of InternMagic. Episode hosts vary per episode from a variety of experts, industry professionals, and more.::RJ Tolson

This show is a series focused on all things internship related. Ever wondered why internships really matter, how they work, or even just what they really are supposed to be? What about finding the best internship for you, getting that internship, and using it to build a career you actually enjoy? _Intern Academy_ (qv), a series in multiple languages, will cover all of this and more. Different episodes in this English series will be hosted by a variety of experts, industry professionals, and more. Sparklift is the sister to brand to InternMagic, an online platform, and app that connects students and people with employers based on personality and compatibility for free.::Pearit
